requests.description: POST /fxQuotes

assertions.description: Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Callback sourceAmount (amount & currency) to match the request
Callback body should contain target amount
Callback transferAmount (amount & currency)to match the request Copy

requests.description: POST /quotes

assertions.description: Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Callback transferAmount (amount & currency)to match the request
Request transactionType scenario to be TRANSFER
Request transactionType initiator to be PAYER
Request transactionType initiatorType to be CONSUMER

requests.description: POST /fxTransfers
Check balances for Payer AFTER fx transfer

assertions.description: Payer position account value should be changed by the amount of the transfer
Payer settlement account value should not be changed

requests.description: Check balances for FXP AFTER fx transfer

assertions.description: FXP Source currency position account value should not be changed
FXP Source currency settlement account value should not be changed
FXP Target currency position account value should not be changed
FXP Target currency settlement account value should not be changed

requests.description: POST /transfer

assertions.description: Callback FSP Destination equal to request FSP Source
Request FSP source the same as quote callback FSP destination

requests.description: Check balances for Payer AFTER transfer

assertions.description: Payeer position account balance should not be changed
